price: Isipo kuwa wale waja wako miongoni mwao walio khitariwa.
footnotes: Isipo kuwa waja wako ulio wateuwa kwa ajili ya kukut'ii Wewe. Hao sina madaraka nao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
